dmca.title: [EV1-C2106281G] Regarding Underage Pictures on Website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, December 11, 2006 9:53 PM To: DMCA Subject: [EV1-C2106281G] Regarding Underage Pictures on Website From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C2106281G] Regarding Underage Pictures on Website Reference: [EV1-C2106281G] For your review. -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx ==== Original Message ==== 1. Mon, 11 Dec 2006 10:51:41 -0600 (CST) Received: by wr-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id i3so653510wra for ; Mon, 11 Dec 2006 08:51:26 -0800 (PST) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=beta; d=gmail.com; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=rNu89RqTcvkVM6wTVPjyb86QbpDpiVXD81uXsrGLY2OaMWjTy0TeVpdAnCk+j4KK5eVp9l w0XfvA5NQAgId/cJQiTD3aOJpZmWr3yHF+LdYFyP1Wub/X3wQ+v8RHCD5Jds1blz8lrN8X2B 90eRg9JWbVwyRz0zX0OVZq8h9SBd0= Received: by 10.78.157.8 with SMTP id f8mr3310991hue.1165855884069; Mon, 11 Dec 2006 08:51:24 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.78.187.12 with HTTP; Mon, 11 Dec 2006 08:51:23 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: <72ead3000612110851i460ea97eoa8e510d707f95d0e@mail.gmail.com> Date: Mon, 11 Dec 2006 11:51:23 -0500 From: "Shane Baldwin" To: admin2@ev1servers.net X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Regarding Underage Pictures on Website Subject: Regarding Underage Pictures on Website MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_80291_24275399.1165855883911" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.94 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.94 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 tests=HTML_10_20 X-Barracuda-Spam-Report: Code version 3.02, rules version 3.0.28369 Rule breakdown below pts rule name description ---- ---------------------- -------------------------------------------------- 0.94 HTML_10_20 BODY: Message is 10% to 20% HTML Return-Path: sbaldwin.webmail@gmail.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Dec 2006 16:51:46.0540 (UTC) FILETIME=[A4EE22C0:01C71D44] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) This email is regarding pictures that are currently being hosted on: http://student-downblouse.adultbus.com/ of who are underage. They are of a girl named Christina who did not authorize anyone to use those pictures on the website, nor is she of legal age as described in the disclaimer of the website. As a host of this website, we are asking that immediate action be taken. Please remove them or legal action will be filed. Thank you. MIME element (text/html) This email is regarding pictures that are currently being hosted on: http://student-downblouse .adultbus.com/ of who are underage. They are of a girl named Christina who did not authorize anyone to use those pictures on the website, nor is she of legal age as described in the disclaimer of the website. As a host of this website, we are asking that immediate action be taken.

Please remove them or legal action will be filed.
Thank you.
